Class MIDletForms

java.lang.Object
  MIDletForms

public class MIDletForms
extends java.lang.Object

MIDletForms is used in conjunctions with the RunMIDlet class. It's simply a class containing the forms and the form properties of the MIDlet created in the RunMidlet class

Author:
Jamie Brindle (06352322) - Msc - Manchester Metropolitan University
